events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized this case under the 'Refund' cluster due to keywords related to returning and money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle your refund request and will be with you shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please confirm your order number?
To process your refund quickly, could you please provide details on why you want to return the product and confirm if the item is unopened?
The item arrived damaged, and it’s definitely not in usable condition. I want a full refund because it's not what I ordered.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We will initiate a full refund and send a prepaid return label for you to send back the damaged item.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate the solution and will send the item back as soon as I receive the return label.
Your refund process has been initiated successfully, and you will receive the prepaid shipping label shortly by email.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the return label and are satisfied with the refund process so far.
Yes, I received the label and have sent the item back. Looking forward to the refund reaching my account soon.
The refund has been completed and your case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and please reach out if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback is highly appreciated.
